title: Break a champion without changing their numbers
body:
Rules:
No cooldown changes
No Damage changes
No "You can now hold X of these at once"
No multipliters for heals

Edit: Rip Inbox. 88 new notifications

No mana cost changes

replies.body:
{{champion:86}} 
Ult kills everyone who bought boots
{{champion:69}} : very good.
{{champion:14}} Shield will explode even if broken.

{{champion:53}} 
Hook ignores minions.
{{champion:24}}  Has a real weapon
{{champion:412}} can now used both Melee only and Ranged only items.
Triple {{item:3074}} due to {{item:3085}} . Even {{champion:10}} would be jelly.
dont forget your {{champion:236}} support who can now turn his ult by recasting in a direction.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eGMN-gNfdaY now plays whenever {{champion:5}} is out of combat.
{{champion:45}} Dark Matter can now be redirected after it is cast.

{{champion:78}} Her ult now knocks enemies towards your fountain, basically its an instant kill unless they are extremely mobile or tanky if your team can follow up on it.
{{champion:8}} Crimson rush no longer has a penalty on minions.
{{champion:201}} Is no longer affected by CC if he blocks the ability.
{{champion:201}} removed internal cd between procs from passive
{{champion:17}} Laugh is now global and is heard every 5 seconds.
Laugh plays whenever you step on a shroom.

{{champion:86}} Villains now take true damage from everything he does to them.

{{champion:420}} Spirits now reflect all their damage to their original self.

{{champion:154}} His Elastic Slingshot now gains range according to his size.

{{champion:26}} His Ult fully restores the target's health and mana.

{{champion:134}} She can now grab champions with her W.

{{champion:78}} Her ult now just knocks you off the face of the earth.

{{champion:69}} You can't change back from being turned to stone.

Go ahead, call them ridiculous, because they are MEANT to be with these redesigns.

{{champion:420}} :damage buff
alternate: tentacles become untargetable for the rest of the game after ulting and dont go away.

{{champion:26}} :healing buff
alternate: w refreshes cooldown of w too.

the rest are good.
{{champion:53}} Can now grab his allies.
Change {{champion:63}} passive to apply true damage like {{summoner:14}}.
and grievous wounds
{{champion:432}} Can now force enemy champs to go through his portal if he stuns them into the entrance.
I wouldn't mind to see that actually happen
{{champion:30}}  Q is now global (Similar to ultimate, but hits *EVERYTHING* [expect turrets])
{{champion:101}} Ult now has global range
That would change numbers however, as range is a number too.
Didn't break my rules though.

{{champion:111}} Naut W now is equal to 100% of his max health and lasts until broken

You never said anything about shields

{{champion:164}} 
 give true da...
give her % health da...
make her untar....
give her a stu....
give her susta...
give her bur...
hmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm
Already too broken, huh?

If she dies while her ult is up, it never disappears.

 And when the description says you can't escape "by any means", that includes respawning.

>No "You can now hold X of these at once"

As a {{champion:134}} main...

http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/trollpasta/images/3/34/Fuck-you-cartoon-meme.gif/revision/latest?cb=20150515201125

{{champion:11}} 

Gets true sight because 6 eyes lol.
Wuju style duration extended on kills.
Highlander grants cc invul.
Can walk during medi.

{{champion:75}}
**Siphoning Strike** refunds its cooldown and mana cost on unit kill.
{{champion:64}}  can see
{{champion:412}} Dark Passage now has a point and click after cast that forces the selected ally to take the lantern.
{{champion:222}} Give her rockets the same attack speed and attack speed scaling as her minigun.
Numbers change.
{{champion:78}} Three pigtails.

{{champion:41}}  Barrels stack. Parrley now has the barrel buff, which turns the bullet into an explosion after landing. Only {{champion:41}}  can target barrels. Oranges remove all debuffs instead of CC. Death's Daughter on Ult is an instant oneshot.

So does damage changes entail damage *type* changes, too? Because that ruins all my "DoT Mages abuse Black Cleaver with physical damage comps" ... 

Uhm ... 
{{champion:28}} Her passive has complete invisibility. 
{{champion:74}} His turrets no longer go offline if he isn't near them.  
{{champion:83}} He can have as many ghouls as he wants. 
{{champion:54}} He is as big in game as he is in lore.
{{champion:27}} poison trail taunts.
rengar is permanently stealthed and can only be revealed by overseers, observers, oracles, ravens, photon cannons, missile turrets and scanner sweeps
I know there is going to be this one smartass who says 'nothing to be done'
{{champion:17}} shroom damage now stacks. so if you hit 2 at once. ur fucking ded kiddo.
{{champion:92}} R: Kills and assists now refresh its duration and allows Wind Slash to be used again.
{{champion:98}} Shen now grants a 50 (+.4 armor)(+.3 Magic Resist)% damage reduction buff to his ally while channeling his ultimate.
So with a typical full build 300 armor and 200 MR they get a 230% damage reduction? Do they just heal for 130% of the damage they would take? Seems legit.
Unkillable Draven incoming.
